name: As Aventuras de Ze Baldinho
description:
Ver. 1.0.2

As Aventuras de Zé Baldinho (Adventures of Joe Bucket) is a educacional but fun game about organic residue recycling. Inspired in 16 bits games like Rayman, Earthworm Jim, cool spot, and others.

Features: Original sprites, original tiles, original BGs (some BGs modified from works of arts in art history), and, original sound track, all done by me. Made in Arcade Game Studio from Bruno R. Marcos.

Controls:

Left/right Arrow Keys: walk

Down key: crouch

S: jump

D: shoot

Down arrow + S: Down plataform

Video keys:

F11: CHANGE TO FULL SCREEN

F10: VIDEO MODES (SCANLINES)

[ ]: CHANGE BRIGHTNES

ESC: OPTION MENU AND QUIT

On the option menu you can remap the keyboard or a game pad.

More info and sound track download at:

http://zebaldinho.blogspot.com.br/

Enjoy...
